full_summary:
# Tender Notice
### Office Seating
#### cb-5133-42977184

**Amendment**: 10
**Publication Date**: 1 May 2023
**Closing Date**: 23 May 2023 14:00:00
**Tender Status**: Expiré

**Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

**Tender Description**

The Royal Canadian Air Force Department of National Defense requires the procurement of office seating for its employees at the Carling Campus. Due to the government’s back-to-office policy, the available number of chairs on site is insufficient, and the department requires a total of 100 chairs. A total of 65 chairs are required for the HR-CIV employees at Carling Campus.

The chairs should meet the following specifications:

* Chair assembly is required
* Chair delivery to the loading dock and then to each cubicle within the office space in Building 3 at Carling Campus

**Schedule of Work**

* Chair delivery must be completed during a business day, between 08:00 and 15:00 hours
* Chairs must be delivered by August 1, 2023, 17:00 hours (COB)

**Important Documents**

* Tender notice: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/5133/npp\_adm%28hr-civ\_eng\_2023-mso-002.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/5133/npp\_adm%28hr-civ\_eng\_2023-mso-002.pdf)
* Detailed specifications: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/5133/rfp\_mc\_furniture2023-mso-002\_en\_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/5133/rfp\_mc\_furniture2023-mso-002\_en\_0.pdf)
* Amendment 1: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/5133/amendement\_1\_2023-mso-002.pdf](https://can
